mapper.select: SELECT us.id as userId, us.username as username, us.companyid as companyId, us.password as password, rol.id as roleId, rol.name as roleName, rol.description as roleDescription, rol.areaid as roleAreaId, area.id areaId, area.name as areaName FROM T_SEG_USER us LEFT JOIN T_SEG_ROLE rol ON us.roleid = rol.id LEFT JOIN T_COM_AREA area ON rol.areaid = area.id WHERE us.username = #{username} AND us.companyid = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SEG_USER (username, password, companyid, roleid) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{companyId}, #{roleId})
